title: 怎么禁止Mcmmo技能插件里面，钓鱼竿钓怪物身上的东西会造成25%伤害？
author: SX_MC
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
mcmmo.ability.fishing.fishermansdiet       Allows access to the fishing ability Fisherman's Diet.
mcmmo.ability.fishing.magic        Allows access to the fishing ability Magic Hunter. Has no effect if the player does not have access to the fishing ability Treasure Hunter.
mcmmo.ability.fishing.shakemob        Allows access to the fishing ability Shake.
mcmmo.ability.fishing.treasures         Allows access to the fishing ability Treasure Hunter.
mcmmo.ability.fishing.vanillaxpboost        Allows players to gain enchanting experience from fishing.
这些是和钓鱼有关的权限们，我对这方面也不懂，建议一个一个试试，只有5个，肯定可以试出来
（如果真的可以的话）

replies.author: SX_MC
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
